keyword: how many calories are in mcdouble
title: How Many Calories Are in a McDouble?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in McDouble from McDonald's, including full nutrition facts like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a McDouble?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's McDouble burger: two beef patties, one cheese slice, bun, onions, pickles, ketchup, mustard; as served.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDouble contains 390 calories and 23 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add one extra slice of cheese

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDouble?
What's the protein in a McDouble?
faqs.a: About 23 g of protein from the beef patties and cheese.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McDouble?
faqs.a: Around 800 mg, mostly from condiments and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a McDouble?
faqs.a: Yes, 34 g total, mainly from the bun, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: How does McDouble compare to Big Mac calories?
faqs.a: McDouble has 390 kcal; Big Mac has about 590 kcal.
